data.actual_result: User profile is overlapped by game info box. Clicking twice in any dimmed area twice to dismiss the game info box.
data.expected_result: User profile is on top of game info box, since it opened later than the game info box.
data.short_description: Game popup in Activity tab covers any other popups.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to Activity tab. - Scroll down and click on any game. - Click on any user in recently played area in the game box. Do not click anywhere else outside the box.
